name: The Happy Place
description:
The game is a psychological take on Spoon Theory and making everything count - even your most basic actions.

Ctrl mouse wheel will shift your camera. (feature not available on controller).
C will make you sneak. (controller right stick button)
The other controls are part of the game-play. however broken this version may be.
Head up a mountain side and see if you can notice the "extras".

A very unfinished game, unfortunately.

If you aren't judging the contest, you may want to have a look at the errata here:

https://mosthostla.itch.io/thehappyplace-errata

If you are judging the contest, just know that the timings are pretty drawn out, I meant to reduce them for the contest deployment but this caused bugs galore instead. 

All assets created in the last 5 days, except Mr Mannequin.

I would love it if I could just finish building the lights in time, but it does not seem likely, so a pre-light build packaging will have to do... If I can provide the later version at a later time I totally would.

The  breakdown/timing should be as follows:

intro sequence / get on island.

120s in - choke first time.

Around 60 after - forced faint sequence. When stuck Press Z or breathe repeatedly.

Right after, Force campfire visit.

- end of game sequence, as I ran out of time.

IF you don't breathe, you'll die and need to restart. Hit Z when the ambient turns colors.
